name: S.M.U.V.E 2.0
description: S.M.U.V.E 2.0 is the ultimate self-hosted, open-source ecosystem for independent artists. It combines a professional music production suite (DAW) with an interactive online social hub featuring a huge catalog of games from HTMLGames. Create music, connect with artists, and showcase your work, all while maintaining full control over your data. Your all-in-one platform for creation, connection, and career growth.
